alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 2:50PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MERCED COUNTY THROUGH 330 PM PST... At 249 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Los Banos, or 15 miles southwest of Atwater, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Merced County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota
